lead_paragraph: The agency said changes would mostly apply to immediate-release opioids and include new boxed warnings, the strongest type, about the risks of abuse and death.

headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Toughens Warnings for Some Opioid Painkillers
headline.main: F.D.A. Toughens Warning Labels for Some Opioid Painkillers

snippet: The agency said changes would mostly apply to immediate-release opioids and include new boxed warnings, the strongest type, about the risks of abuse and death.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration announces that it is strengthening label requirements for certain types of opioid painkillers in effort to combat drug abuse epidemic in United States.
